statements: SELECT * FROM buildings_energy_usage;
SELECT building_name, energy_usage FROM buildings_energy_usage ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, energy_usage, efficiency_rating FROM buildings_energy_usage WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM buildings_energy_usage WHERE efficiency_rating >= 5 ORDER BY building_name ASC, energy_usage DESC;
SELECT building_name, energy_usage AS usage_kwh, efficiency_rating * 100 AS efficiency_percent FROM buildings_energy_usage;
SELECT building_id, building_name, energy_usage, efficiency_rating FROM buildings_energy_usage;
SELECT building_id, building_name FROM buildings_energy_usage WHERE energy_usage > 1000 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT building_name, energy_usage FROM buildings_energy_usage WHERE efficiency_rating >= 4 AND energy_usage BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) as average_energy_usage, MAX(efficiency_rating) as max_efficiency_rating FROM buildings_energy_usage;
SELECT * FROM buildings_energy_usage ORDER BY energy_usage DESC, efficiency_rating ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT building_name, address, area_sqft FROM buildings;
SELECT building_id, area_sqft, year_built, building_name FROM buildings;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_type = 'electricity';
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings WHERE area_sqft > 5000;
SELECT building_id, energy_type, energy_amount FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_type = 'gas';
SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE area_sqft > 5000 ORDER BY building_name DESC
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings WHERE year_built < 2000 ORDER BY year_built ASC
SELECT building_name, year_built FROM buildings WHERE building_name LIKE 'A%' OR building_name LIKE 'B%'
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM energy_usage GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY total_energy DESC
SELECT DISTINCT building_name, address FROM buildings
SELECT * FROM building_energy_data;
SELECT building_id, energy_usage FROM building_energy_data ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM building_info WHERE building_location = 'New York';
SELECT building_id, improvement_description FROM efficiency_improvements WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM building_energy_data;
SELECT * FROM building_energy_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT building_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM building_info JOIN building_energy_data ON building_info.building_id = building_energy_data.building_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT building_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM building_energy_data GROUP BY building_id HAVING AVG(energy_usage) > 50;

SELECT building_name, improvement_description FROM building_info JOIN efficiency_improvements ON building_info.building_id = efficiency_improvements.building_id WHERE building_location = 'New York' ORDER BY building_name;

SELECT building_name, energy_usage, timestamp FROM building_info JOIN building_energy_data ON building_info.building_id = building_energy_data.building_id WHERE energy_usage > 75 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM buildings WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT building_name, zone_name FROM buildings INNER JOIN energy_zones ON buildings.building_id = energy_zones.building_id;
SELECT building_id, building_name, building_location FROM buildings;
SELECT energy_usage, date_time, building_id FROM energy_readings ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_zones WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT building_name, building_location, energy_usage FROM buildings b JOIN energy_readings r ON b.building_id = r.building_id;

SELECT building_name, zone_name, improvement_description FROM buildings b JOIN efficiency_improvements i ON b.building_id = i.building_id JOIN energy_zones z ON b.building_id = z.building_id ORDER BY zone_name ASC, building_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM buildings WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT location, building_name FROM buildings ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT building_name, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM buildings JOIN energy_meters ON buildings.building_id = energy_meters.building_id JOIN energy_measurements ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_measurements.meter_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT building_name, location FROM buildings;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE meter_type = 'electricity';
SELECT building_name, construction_year FROM buildings ORDER BY construction_year DESC;
SELECT building_name, location, meter_type FROM buildings JOIN energy_meters ON buildings.building_id = energy_meters.building_id;

SELECT building_name, measurement_value, measurement_date FROM buildings JOIN energy_meters ON buildings.building_id = energy_meters.building_id JOIN energy_measurements ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_measurements.meter_id;
